title: Russian language - Wikipedia
snippet: Russian is written using the Russian alphabet of the Cyrillic script; it distinguishes between consonant phonemes with palatal secondary articulation and those withoutâ€”the so-called "soft" and "hard" sounds.

title: Russian language | Origin, History, Dialects, & Facts | Britannica
snippet: Russian language, principal state and cultural language of Russia. Together with Ukrainian and Belarusian, the Russian language makes up the eastern branch of the Slavic family of languages.
